title: Exposé
description: Crystal and Autumn are strippers turned crime-fighters and they’re tracking The Cobra with the help of Mr. LaShade, suave, smooth-talking club owner.
altHero: Mr. LaShade in a fancy suit and hat
alt1: Nikki Fernandez in glowing red light
alt2: Mr. LaShade sits at a desk
alt4: still in stripper garb, Crystal and Autumn talk with Mr. LaShade
